Home / Start Here

Start Here

This page is the shortest route into the archive. Pick a time budget, then follow the links in sequence.

If you have 5 minutes

Start with a fast orientation to the archive surface and quality status.

  • Home Primary navigation map for the archive.
  • Start Here Guided entry with short paths by available time.
  • Archive Status Current metadata and transcript coverage snapshot.

If you have 30 minutes

Move from orientation into structure and curation.

  • Interviews by Conference Conference-centered chronology and context.
  • Interviewees People-first view across repeated conversations.
  • Community Stories Curated tracks that show longer arcs.

If you have 2 hours

Follow archive lineage with docs and deeper historical context.

  • Site Tree Explorer Deep route inventory with filtering.
  • Video Metadata Completeness Per-video quality matrix and missing-field visibility.
  • Work Through Conversations Selected links that connect archive themes to engineering practice.

Glossary

  • SCNA: Software Craftsmanship North America conference series.
  • SCMC: Software Craftsmanship McHenry County working-group talks.
  • One-offs: Standalone recordings outside recurring conference or community series.
  • Canonical ID: Stable identifier used to connect pages, metadata, and transcript assets.
